attributes.action: Remove the Gypsy Site on Rectory Lane, SURREY
attributes.additional_details:
A group of Gypsys have invaded a local field in Byfleet, SURREY and are converting it into a derelict farm.
They are not paying taxes, they are inconsiderate to neighbours and have been speeding, littering on and destroying the local community's green areas.

If no action is taken, they will continue to take advantage of our proud landscape.
